repository.corpname: Washington and Lee University, James G. Leyburn Library, Special Collections and Archives

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The materials from Washington & Lee University's Special Collections are made available for use in research, teaching, and private study, pursuant to U.S. Copyright law. The user assumes full responsibility for any use of the materials, including but not limited to, infringement of copyright and publication rights of reproduced materials. Any materials used should be fully credited with the source. Permission for publication of this material, in part or in full, must be secured with the Head of Special Collections.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals
originalsloc.p: The materials in this collection are photocopies. The originals are owned by Duncan G. Groner.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation: [Identification of item], Virginius Groner Papers, WLU Coll. 0062, Special Collections and Archives, James G. Leyburn Library, Washington and Lee University, Lexington, VA
In some cases the citation format may vary. Please contact Special Collections' staff to verify the appropriate format.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Gift of Duncan G. Groner in 1974.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Nineteen photocopied pages of newspaper clippings, concerning General Virginus D. Groner, including articles from a variety of papers dealing with the struggle between General Groner and other Republicans including General William Mahone for control of the Republican Party in Virginia at the 1888 national nominating convention in Chicago and during the gubernatorial campaign of 1889 in Virginia.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research use.
